properties.name: eprel.api-url
properties.description: Base URL of the EPREL API.

properties.name: eprel.api-key
properties.description: API key required to download product catalogues.

properties.name: eprel.scheduling-frequency-days
properties.description: Number of days between two catalogue synchronisations.

properties.name: eprel.index-bulk-size
properties.description: Number of products sent to Elasticsearch in a single bulk request.
